item.description:
I noticed there's some interest in getting together at a coffee shop on a Saturday. So I'm proposing this time as a social time, also we can get together and plan some events so we can all avoid cabin fever with little ones this winter!

In my experience, both the Mt Auburn and Galen St Starbucks are extremely busy. So I'm proposing a little different location -- it's not fancy, but more of us can join...

Thanks,
Susan
item.name: Planning /Social Meeting at Starbucks (adjacent to Watertown Target store)
